prt_are02,146,138,6	script	Cards	982,{
switch(select("Weapon:Top:Armor:Shield:Garment:Shoes:Accessories:PvM Cards")){
case 1:
	callshop "WCard",1;
	break;
case 2:
	callshop "HCard",1;
	break;
case 3:
	callshop "ACard",1;
	break;
case 4:
	callshop "SCard",1;
	break;	
case 5:
	callshop "GCard",1;
	break;
case 6:
	callshop "FCard",1;
	break;
case 7:
	callshop "AccCard",1;
	break;
case 8:
	switch(select("Garment:Shield:Weapon")){
		case 1: callshop "PVMgarm",1; break;
		case 2: callshop "PVMshield",1; break;
		case 3: callshop "PVMweap",1; break;
	}
}
}

-	shop	WCard	-1,4140:-1,4452:-1,4018:-1,4094:-1,4246:-1,4390:-1,4368:-1,4284:-1,4427:-1,4297:-1,4388:-1,4082:-1,4125:-1,4069:-1,4004:-1,4421:-1,4176:-1,4251:-1,4360:-1,4002:-1,4020:-1,4026:-1,4157:-1,4156:-1,4072:-1,4163:-1,4345:-1,4019:-1,4362:-1,4115:-1,4035:-1,4268:-1,4350:-1,4006:-1,4076:-1,4030:-1,4055:-1,4341:-1,4057:-1,4317:-1,4106:-1,4440:-1,4085:-1,4007:-1,4329:-1,4335:-1,4024:-1,4380:-1,4104:-1,4005:-1,4017:-1,4312:-1,4117:-1,4025:-1,4092:-1,4037:-1,4394:-1,4086:-1,4225:-1,4395:-1,4172:-1,4096:-1,4281:-1;
-	shop	HCard	-1,4188:-1,4438:-1,4229:-1,4296:-1,4122:-1,4177:-1,4354:-1,4110:-1,4271:-1,4278:-1,4087:-1,4161:-1,4343:-1,4269:-1,4412:-1,4366:-1,4195:-1,4112:-1,4364:-1,4206:-1,4127:-1,4185:-1,4223:-1,4411:-1,4311:-1;
-	shop	ACard	-1,4426:-1,4409:-1,4387:-1,4371:-1,4114:-1,4023:-1,4233:-1,4119:-1,4300:-1,4299:-1,4298:-1,4170:-1,4173:-1,4370:-1,4181:-1,4098:-1,4346:-1,4141:-1,4405:-1,4270:-1,4150:-1,4162:-1,4286:-1,4301:-1,4295:-1,4201:-1,4105:-1,4166:-1,4392:-1,4338:-1,4099:-1,4031:-1,4315:-1,4011:-1,4337:-1,4383:-1,4021:-1,4194:-1,4101:-1,4216:-1,4078:-1,4393:-1,4222:-1,4404:-1,4220:-1,4042:-1,4218:-1,4089:-1,4016:-1,4369:-1,4333:-1,4401:-1;
